concise_definition: n. 决心, 决心, 确定, 诊断

definitions.explanation_en: A firm decision to do or achieve something, often despite difficulties or obstacles; a strong sense of purpose and persistence.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指尽管面临困难或障碍，仍坚定地决心去做或实现某事；一种强烈的目标感和坚持不懈的精神。
definitions.example_en: Her determination to succeed despite numerous setbacks inspired everyone around her.
definitions.example_cn: 她尽管屡遭挫折仍决心成功，这激励了她身边的每一个人。

definitions.explanation_en: The act of officially deciding or establishing something, especially through analysis or calculation.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指通过分析或计算正式决定或确立某事的行为。
definitions.example_en: The determination of the exact cause of the accident took several weeks of investigation.
definitions.example_cn: 确定事故的确切原因花了数周的调查。

definitions.explanation_en: The quality of being resolute and unwavering in one's goals or beliefs; a characteristic often associated with strong willpower.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在目标或信念上坚定不移的品质；常与强大的意志力相关联的特质。
definitions.example_en: His determination was evident in the way he trained every day without fail.
definitions.example_cn: 他每天毫不间断地训练，充分体现了他的决心。

comparison.analysis: “Resolve” (决心) 通常指做出决定的瞬间行为，强调“下定决心”的动作，常作动词使用；而 “determination” 更侧重于持续的状态或品质，是决心的长期体现。例如：He made a resolve（他下定决心） vs. His determination lasted years（他的决心持续了数年）。
“Perseverance” (坚持不懈) 强调在面对持续困难时仍不放弃的行动过程，侧重于“坚持到底”的行为；而 “determination” 更侧重于最初做出决定的内在意志力。两者常共存，但“determination”是起点，“perseverance”是延续。
“Willpower” (意志力) 是一种心理能力，指控制冲动、抵制诱惑、坚持目标的内在力量；而 “determination” 是这种力量在特定目标上的具体表现。Willpower 是资源，determination 是应用该资源的定向决心。
